parametrized_description: A farmer needs to transport TotalChickens chickens using buses and cars. Each bus trip can carry BusCapacity chickens and takes BusTripTime hours. Each car trip can carry CarCapacity chickens and takes CarTripTime hours. The number of bus trips cannot exceed MaxBusTrips. At least MinCarTripPercentage of the total trips must be by car. The objective is to minimize the total transportation time.

BusCapacity.description: Number of chickens that a bus can carry per trip

BusTripTime.description: Time taken by a bus per trip in hours

CarCapacity.description: Number of chickens that a car can carry per trip

CarTripTime.description: Time taken by a car per trip in hours

MaxBusTrips.description: Maximum allowed number of bus trips

MinCarTripPercentage.description: Minimum required percentage of total trips that must be by car

TotalChickens.description: Total number of chickens that need to be transported

constraints.description: The number of bus trips cannot exceed MaxBusTrips.
At least MinCarTripPercentage of the total trips must be by car.
The total number of chickens transported by buses and cars must be at least TotalChickens.

objective.description: The total transportation time is the sum of the times of all bus and car trips. The objective is to minimize the total transportation time.
